about_the_game: Handsome and Brave is a story about a World in turmoil and a Knight that can't save it. But he's not alone, he has you. As a Watcher you can pickup, move, and most importantly throw the ragdoll Knight. Together you'll embark on an epic journey to help people, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets about this new mysterious place.
